La représentante du groupe, du nom de Bénédicta est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Bénédicta est âgée de 30 ans et vit au Bénin. Bénédicta a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Bénédicta est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Marius. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Bénédicta vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Bénédicta vend depuis cinq ans, des chaussures et des vêtements à son domicile, mais aussi de façon ambulante. Bénédicta s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Bénédicta sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe "LES MERVEILLES DE DIEU", un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The "LES MERVEILLES DE DIEU" ["God's Marvels"] group is made up of four women from the same neighborhood.  This is the third time that the group has requested financial aid through ALIDé in order to expand their business activity.  The group representative, named Bénédicta, has her hand raised in the photo.  She is 30 years old and lives in Benin.  Bénédicta left school at the primary level.  She is married to a chauffeur named Marius.  The couple has three children, all in school and in their care.  Bénédicta lives with her husband and children.  The couple shares the various household expenses.  In order to cover the family's expenses, Bénédicta has been selling shoes and clothes for five years, both at home and door to door.  She buys her products in a market in Benin.  With the goal of satisfying her customers and to increase her sales and income, Bénédicta, along with the other members of the "LES MERVEILLES DE DIEU" group, is requesting a third loan through ALIDé.  The first two loans were paid back on time.

loans.use: to buy shoes and clothing.

loans.name: Silvia Janet

texts.es:
Silvia es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de Arroz, así como también por sus hermosas playas y por la generosidad de sus pobladores, es una mujer muy fuerte, es madre de 2 hermosos hijos cuyas edades comprenden 14 y 18 años, la comida peruana es muy sabrosa , por ello uno de los platos que le gusta mucho es el riquísimo pescado al vapor, asimismo Silvia nos comenta que uno de sus pasatiempos es pasear por el rio de camana y asi se distrae un poco.

Con mucho esfuerzo Silvia pudo iniciar su negocio de venta de comida, en especial caldos, sopas y salchipapa, ella le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 6horas, a ella le gusta mucho cocinar, por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque cuando prepara los platillos lo hace con mucho gusto y por ello le salen muy sabrosos y los clientes se sienten satisfechos.

Silvia esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para la preparación de sus platillos y para la reparación de su carrito salchipapero, lo que le permitirá aumentar sus ingresos y así seguir luchando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos para que sean mejores que ella”.
texts.en:
Silvia is a very hard-working woman who lives in the city of Camaná.  This city is characterized by agriculture, and especially rice farming, as well as for its beautiful beaches and the generosity of its people.  Silvia is a very strong woman.  She is the mother of two lovely sons aged 14 and 18.  Peruvian food is very tasty, and one of the dishes she really likes is the delicious steamed fish.  Silvia also tells us is that one of her pastimes is going for walks along the river in Camaná, and in this way providing herself with some distraction.

With much effort, Silvia has been able to start up her business selling food, especially broths, soups and salchipapa (a typical dish of sliced hot dogs and fries).  She works about 6 hours a day.  She very much enjoys cooking, and believes that things are going well for her with her business because when she prepares her dishes, she does it with great pleasure which means they turn out very tasty and her customers are satisfied.

Silvia is very grateful for the Kiva lenders as with the help that they are providing her she will be able to purchase ingredients for preparing her dishes and be able to repair her salchipapa cart.  This will allow her to increase her earnings and so continue to work towards accomplishing her grand dream: "Provide her children with a profession so that they can do better than her".

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and to repair her cart.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is one of twenty-one members of the village bank, “Sumac Ayllu”, located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Cristina is 53 years old and married. Her eight children are all now living independently with their own families. 

For the last eight years, Cristina has run a restaurant from her house. She serves a complete lunch menu offering “sopa y segundo” (soup and main course) to hungry customers. She says that her most popular dishes are steak, barbecue, and lomo saltado, a popular Peruvian dish of stir-fried beef, potatoes, and tomatoes.

Cristina’s restaurant is missing some necessary equipment. With her loan, she plans to buy a large pot as well as more plates and utensils. Her dream is to open a large restaurant in an independent location.

loans.use: to buy a large pot and more plates and utensils.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.en:
Luz Marina is one of twenty-one members of the village bank, “Sumac Ayllu”, which is located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Luz Marina is 33 years old and lives with her partner and two children, ages 6 and 16. She owns a small grocery store, where she sells everything from basic groceries to school supplies. She has run this business for seven years.

Luz Marina is requesting a loan in order to purchase merchandise for her store. She would like to buy school supplies in time for the start of the school year in March. Additionally, she will use the loan to pay for her store’s operating expenses, such as electricity. With continued success, Luz Marina aspires to open a restaurant in two years’ time.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies and pay for store operating expenses.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria tiene 27 años de edad, ella vive junto a su pareja en el distrito de Parcona, Ica , Perú, juntos tienen 1 pequeño de 6 años, al cual adora mucho y es su motor para salir adelante, su esposo siempre la apoya en todo, el trabaja como chofer y con ello aporta para los gastos del hogar, como buena peruana ama nuestra comida y por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”, Maria solo estudio hasta quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar Enfermería.

Maria trabaja en su negocio de venta de especias (venta de alimentos molidos especialmente para aderezar las comidas), ella le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 30 clientes al día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable en la atención a los clientes y porque ofrece productos en buen estado.

Actualmente Maria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería para la elaboración de sus especias y así tener más ingresos, con ello ella seguirá trabajando para seguir luchando y cumplir su más grande sueño.
texts.en:
Maria is 27 years old. She lives together with her partner in the Parcona district of Ica, Peru. Together they have a little one who is 6 years old, whom they adore very much and who is their motive for getting ahead. Her husband always supports her in everything. He works as a chauffeur and through this he provides for the expenses of the home. Like a good Peruvian he loves our food and therefore one of his favorite dishes is the rich "Lomo Saltado" (salted spine). Maria only studied until the 5th grade, but she would have liked to study nursing.

Maria works in her business of selling spices (ground foods sold specially to flavor meals). She dedicates about 8 hours per day to her work and she can serve up to 30 clients a day. She believes that her business is going well because she is friendly in her attention to her clients and because she offers products in good condition. 

Currently Maria is very thankful for the loans from Kiva since, thanks to the support that it has provided, she will be able to buy more merchandise for the creation of her spices and so to have more earnings. With it she will continue working to continue fighting and to complete her greatest dream.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (inputs for making spices)

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan is one of twenty-one members of the village bank, “Sumac Ayllu”, which is located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Juan is 41 years old and lives with his partner and two children, ages 10 and 16. He has operated a taxi service for the last five years, offering both short and long distance transportation in Cusco and the Sacred Valley. His hours can range from 3 a.m. to 11 p.m. at night, depending on his customers’ needs on any given day.

Juan is requesting a loan in order to help pay for a new vehicle. He tries to replace his car every year, to mitigate the consequences of wear and tear and depreciation in the vehicle’s value. Juan’s dream is to continue investing in his business so that he can provide for his family’s home and his children’s education.

loans.use: to pay for a new taxi vehicle.

loans.name: Alodo Alome Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ALODO ALOME est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans la même zone. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Philomène est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Philomène est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un certain Zachée. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Philomène vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Philomène n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Il y a trois ans, Philomène mène comme activité la vente d’œufs et de fruits (bananes) dans son quartier. De façon secondaire, Philomène vend de la bouillie. Cette activité lui permet de contribuer sans grande difficulté aux besoins de sa famille. Philomène s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Philomène sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ALODO ALOME, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The ALODO ALOME group is made up of three people from the same area.  This is the second time that this group has requested financial aid through ALIDé, in order to expand their businesses.  The group representative, named Philomène, has her hand raised in the photo.  Philomène is 37 years old and married to a man named Zachée.  The couple has two children, both in school and in their care.  She lives with her husband and children.  Philomène
did not go to school.  Three years ago, she began selling eggs and fruit (bananas) in her neighborhood.  On the side, she also sells porridge.  This business allows her to meet her family's needs without much difficulty.  She buys her products and ingredients in a market in Benin.  With the goals of satisfying her customers and increasing her sales and income, Philomène and the other members of the ALODO ALOME group are requesting a second loan through ALIDé.  The first loan was repaid on time.

loans.use: to buy eggs and bananas.

loans.name: Abigoun Honorine

texts.fr: Abigoun Honorine est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Elias. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Abigoun Honorine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la famille. Il y a une dizaine d’année que Abigoun Honorine mène comme activité, la vente de céréales et divers autres articles (farine de blé, etc.) à son domicile. Abigoun Honorine s'approvisionne au Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire, Abigoun Honorine sollicite pour la quatrième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois crédits obtenus précédemment ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Abigoun Honorine is 37 years old and married to a driver named Elias. The couple have five dependent children, some of whom go to school. Abigoun Honorine lives with her husband and their children, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

Abigoun Honorine started selling cereals and other items (wheat flour, etc.) from her home about ten years ago. She buys her merchandise in Benin. Eager to achieve customer satisfaction and to increase her sales, she is seeking a fourth loan from ALIDé. All three previous loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, wheat flour etc. for resale.

loans.name: Manantial De Vida 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Alfida is one of the members of the group named Manantial De Vida 1, 2 & 3. They are located in Samana, a city known for its developing tourism and for being a special destination due to eco-tourism because of its many natural attractions. Alfida and her group of 15 members are taking loans for their businesses. They are selling clothes, shoes, food, cosmetics, etc.

Alfida requires a loan to buy clothes, underwear, and shoes. She sells them in her house and in other places by walking. She started her business with part of her savings around four years ago. Alfida is receiving her 7th loan and she will take a step toward improving her business by investing this loan to increase her sales.

Alfida and her group have been able to take a step toward improving their own, their families', and their communities' lives. Each member of the group is committed to make changes in their life and families. Alfida thanks you for your help.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, and underwear.

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal 100% Charapoto. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 29 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 9 y 1 año,  el mayor  estudia en escuela. El marido es chofer de cooperativa de transporte interprovincial.
 
Ella para ganar algo por su cuenta y así sentirse independiente se dedica al comercio, vende productos para el hogar como planchas, colchones, camas, licuadoras, zapatos por catalogo y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y bajo pedidos, trabaja tres días a la semana, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana o cada quince de acuerdo a lo que quieran sus clientes, lleva más de 5 años dedicada al comercio y le va muy bien. 

Este crédito es para comprar productos para el hogar, zapatos, perfumes, cremas y cosméticos. Está en el  Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener un local para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
In the city of Charapoto, the Communal Bank 100%  Charapoto meets every 15 days. This region is known for its traditional culture and, moreover, for being a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province which are San Jacinto and San Clemente. 

In this place lives Ms. Ana, who is 29 years old and who maintains a common law marriage from which she has two children who are 9 and 1 years old. The older one studies in school. Her husband is a driver for a cooperative for interprovincial transportation. 

To earn something for her expenses and to feel independent, she dedicates herself to sales, selling products for the home like plates, mattresses, beds, blenders, shoes from a catalogue and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). Her manner of selling is door to door and through orders. She works three days each week and she sells her products on credit and charges each week, or 15 days, her clients for what they want. She has spent more than 5 years dedicated to sales and it is going very well. 

This loan is to buy products for the home, shoes, perfumes, creams and cosmetics. She was part of the Communal Bank from the beginning and she likes it because of the help that the loans give her. 

Her dream is to have a place to sell her products.

loans.use: To buy products for the home, shoes, perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Alaqami Group

texts.en:
ALAQAMI is a group of three women from Aden, Yemen who are close friends and live in large traditional families with their husbands, children, and other relatives. Each of them is married with at least three children. These women sell various items such as incense. 

To expand their business, the group members decided to request a loan of 150,000 Yemeni Rial (YER) from AMB. 

Amna is 45 years old (she is in the middle of the photo) and the leader of this group. She is a married woman and has six children, three of whom are adults. They are her reason and motivation to do well in life. She lives in Aden. 

Amna has been running incense for twenty years. She started this business due to acquiring her work from her mother who previously made incense. 

With her family's encouragement in order to support them with their household expenses, she started work building the business back up. She gradually grew the business and increased the variety of products she sold. She is famous in the incense industry. 

She would like to expand her business in order to meet her clients' needs.  She requested a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to invest in buying supplies for her business like perfumes, sugar and other items that will be used to make incense to sell.

In the future, she would like to expand her business by distributing incense around her area and cities in her country.

loans.use: to buy incense-making supplies

loans.name: Sorie Baimba's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are primary school teachers in Koindu, a city in Eastern Sierra Leone.  This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, to request a loan.  With the help of this loan, these teachers will be equipped to buy or invest in businesses that their salaries alone do not allow them to.  At the end of each month, this group of teachers can repay their SMT/Kiva loan using their monthly salaries.  Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for making the repayments on their behalf.

The leader of this group is Sorie.  Born in Manjoro village, the 59-year-old man is married to a trader and the couple has six children – two in primary school, two in secondary school, one not yet of school age and one adult.  Sorie has been a teacher for 34 years.  He has requested a loan in order to buy materials like corrugated iron, sand, cement, etc. for the construction of a family house.

loans.use: to buy materials like corrugated iron, sand, cement, etc. for the construction of a family house

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina nació en la ciudad de Coya (Perú) y tiene 50 años de edad. Ella es casada y fruto de hermosa relación tiene once hijos de las cuales cinco son independientes y seis todavía están a su lado. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de chicha de jora, crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo pollos y gallinas de doble pechuga, ella también vende cerveza en su pequeño local. Ella tiene una pequeña picantería donde vende las bebidas alcohólicas. Ya son 15 años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. El crédito que requiere Paulina es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo cerveza y maíz. 

Los sociios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Paulina was born in the city of Coya, Peru, and is 50 years old.  She is married and from this beautiful relationship has eleven children, of whom five are independent and six are still with her.  Currently she lives in the city where she was born and where she works.  She works making "chicha de jora" [traditional corn liquor] and raising small animals such as, for example, double-breasted chickens and hens.  She also sells beer in her little store.  She has a small restaurant where she sells alcoholic beverages.  She has been doing this work for 15 years already and it is going very well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into her job.

The loan that Paulina needs is to buy merchandise such as, for example, beer and corn.

The members of Mosoq Ñusta Communal Bank meet every month in the district of Pisaq in the province of Calca (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because there you find one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as beer and corn.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en: Dorothy is 37 years old and lives in West Point. She is married and has two children ages 10 and 15; they are presently in school and live at home. For the past six years she has been selling fashion earrings, necklaces, bracelets and many others item in the market. She has a lot of customers and makes a lot of profit, especially during Christmas season. She is requesting a loan to purchase more earrings, bracelets, necklaces and many other items for her business. She plans to expand her business and send her children to a quality school.

loans.use: to purchase more earrings, bracelets, necklaces and many other items for her business

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel  is 42 years old and lives in Paynesville. He is married and has two children ages 10 and 15 respectively. For the past three years he has been running a grocery shop where he sells many items like toothpaste, soft drinks, water, etc. He has a lot of customers and his daily sales are very high during the dry season. He is requesting a loan to purchase more toothpaste, soft drinks, and sacks of water for his business. He plans to expand his business and build a store in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more toothpaste, soft drinks, and sacks of water for his business

loans.name: Gladis

texts.en:
Gladis is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco.  Gladis is 45 years old.  She is married and has three children who are 15, 18, and 22 years old.  

Gladis has run a bakery from her house for the last 24 years, where she produces bread, cakes and pastries.  She is requesting a loan in order to purchase raw materials such as flour, sugar, lard and firewood.  With this loan, she hopes to grow her business into a larger enterprise, so that she can open a large bakery with an electric oven in the city center.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, lard and firewood for her bakery.

loans.name: Julio

texts.en:
Julio is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Julio is 45 years old and married with three children who are 15, 18, and 22 years old. He has worked as a taxi driver for ten years while his wife operates a bakery out of their home.

Julio is requesting a loan to support the expansion of the family bakery through the purchase of materials such as flour, sugar, lard and firewood. With this loan of 1500 PEN from Asociación Arariwa, Julio and his wife hope to continue growing their business into a larger enterprise, so that they can open a large bakery with an electric oven in the city center.

loans.use: to purchase bakery materials such as flour, sugar, lard, and firewood.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.en:
Humberto is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Humberto is 38 years old and married with two children who are nine and eighteen years old. He has owned a printing house for four years where he produces cards, leaflets, invoices, sales receipts, and books for his customers.

Humberto is requesting a loan from Asociación Arariwa of 1500 PEN in order to purchase materials such as plaques, paper, and a burner for his business. His dream is to see his children become professionals and to continue growing his store.

loans.use: to purchase printing materials such as plaques, paper, and a burner.

loans.name: Christian Bell

texts.es:
Christian es un joven muy entusiasta, vive en el caserío de Santiago, Ica Perú, el cual se caracteriza por su agricultura, su clima cálido y por la generosidad de sus pobladores, junto a su pareja tiene 2 pequeños, asimismo su pareja lo apoya mucho en todo lo que el hace y también  trabaja vendiendo ropa y con ello aporta para los gastos del hogar, en sus tiempos libres le gusta ir a la piscina para relajarse un poco, como buen peruano le gusta mucho nuestra comida, por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Ají de Gallina”.

Christian trabaja taxista, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 14 horas diarias, puede atender hasta 48 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amigable con sus clientes y sobre todo respetuoso.

Actualmente el está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar mercadería para el negocio de su esposa, en especial ropa de temporada escolar, con ello podrán aumentar sus ingresos y así seguir ahorrando junto a su pareja para poder cumplir su más grande sueño:” Tener varias tiendas de ropa”.
texts.en:
Christian is a very enthusiastic young man who lives in the hamlet of Santiago, Ica Peru, which is characterized by its agriculture, its warm climate and by the generosity of its people. Together with his partner he has 2 little ones. His partner also supports him very much in everything that he does and she also works selling clothing and with him provides for the expenses of their home. During their free time they like to go to the pool to relax a little. Like all good peruvians he likes our food very much and one of his favorite dishes is the rich “Ají de Gallina” (chili pepper chicken). 

Christian works as a taxi driver, he spends around 14 hours each day working and he can attend to up to 48 clients in a day. He believes that he does well in his business because he is very friendly with his clients and above all he is respectful.

Currently, he is very grateful for the loans from Kiva since thanks to this help he will be able to buy merchandise for his wife's business, specifically clothes for the school season and with it he will be able to increase their earnings and  continue saving together with his partner to be able to complete their greatest dream "to have various clothing stores."

loans.use: To buy merchandise (clothing)

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Felipa nació en la ciudad de Pisaq (Perú) y tiene 55 años de edad. Ella es casada y fruto de hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella se dedica a la venta de dulces en el kiosco del colegio de la comunidad Tambohuaso. Ya son 25 años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. El crédito que requiere Felipa es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo dulces, galletas, pasteles, tortas y otras cosas más.

Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Felipa was born in the city of Pisaq (in Peru), and is 55 years old.  She is married, and has five children from this wonderful relationship.  She currently lives in her native city, which is also where she works.  She works selling confectionery from a kiosk in the Tambohuaso community school.  She has been working in this business for 25 years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the determination she brings to her work.

Felipa is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise, for example confectionery, cookies, pastries, cakes, and other additional items. 

The “Mosoq Ñusta” community bank meets monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise, for example confectionery, cookies, pastries, cakes and other additional items.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is a 35-year-old businessman who lives in Juba Nimule. He is married with 4 children between the ages of 12 and 2 years.  Three of them go to school. 

Nicholas runs a book store, and he has been in the business for one year.  He has no employees. Nicholas heard about Finance Sudan from the loan officer’s promotion done in the market as well as in the radio advert. He is taking a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds (SDG) to purchase more items like new books, novels, and many others. Nicholas has no source of income other than this business. 

In 5 years time, Nicholas would like to open an Internet café in the same shop so that it can be expanded.

His major challenges include home expenses only. 

Nicholas says that he has a lot of appreciation for the finance South Sudan program.

loans.use: to purchase more items like new books, novels, and many others.

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.en:
Saturnino is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco.   Saturnino is 53 years old.  He is married and has three children between the ages of 29 and 33. 

He owns a hardware shop where he offers services to construct metal structures.  He has been engaged in this business for five years and is requesting a loan in order to purchase cement, which he plans to sell in his shop.  With this loan, Saturnino looks forward to increasing sales and expanding his business.

loans.use: to purchase cement to sell in his hardware shop.

loans.name: Fanny

texts.en:
Fanny is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco.  Fanny is 39 years old and lives with her partner and three children who are 11, 16 and 18 years old.   Since she was a child, she has been involved in the family business, raising and selling hens and guinea pigs.  She also sells agricultural products and frozen potatoes.  

Fanny is requesting a loan in order to purchase home improvement materials such as sand and cement.  The materials will be used to improve her house as well as to develop a minimarket inside her home, which will bring her another source of income.

loans.use: to buy home improvement materials such as sand and cement.

loans.name: Benito

texts.en:
Benito is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Benito is 57 years old and single with four children between the ages of 23 and 35. He works in housing construction, often working on his own accounts or as a contractor.

Benito is requesting a loan from Asociación Arariwa of 800 PEN in order to purchase building materials such as tools, planks, and poles. He also needs a concrete mixer. He hopes that the loan will allow him to acquire a complete set of tools in order to perform his trade most efficiently.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as tools, planks, poles and a concrete mixer.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en:
Jaime is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. He is 29 years old, single and has been a construction worker for eight years, primarily as a contractor for housing projects.

Jaime is requesting a loan of 1000 PEN from Asociación Arariwa in order to purchase tools such as a concrete mixer and a circular saw. His dream is to build his trade into a microenterprise offering construction services.

loans.use: to buy tools such as a concrete mixer and a circular saw.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. She is 42 years old and married with four children between the ages of eight and 21. Because of her poor health, she has not been able to work recently. Previously, she worked as a street vendor selling maná, a Peruvian sweet pancake made from maize.

Cirila is requesting a loan of 500 PEN from Asociación Arariwa in order to buy maize to produce more maná in time for the Inti Raymi festival in Cusco. Also known as the Festival of the Sun, the week-long celebration draws hundreds of thousands of people to Cusco in late June. With this loan, Cirila hopes to continue to be able to provide for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy maize to prepare corn pancakes.

loans.name: Marivel

texts.es:
Marivel nació en la ciudad de Pisaq (Perú) y tiene 35 años de edad. Ella es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y distribución de artesanía de tipo platería. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Marivel  requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como alambre y otras cosas más.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Marivel was born in the city of Pisaq (in Peru), and is 35 years old.  She is married, and has three children from this relationship.  She currently lives in the city of her birth, which is also where she works.  She works making and distributing handicrafts made from silver.  She has been working in this business for 15 years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the dedication that she brings to her work.

Marivel is requesting the loan to purchase materials such as wire and other additional items.  

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as wire and other additional items.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco nació en la ciudad de Pisaq (Perú) y tiene 58 años de edad, él es casado y fruto de esta unión cinco hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, él se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía de tipo cerámica, él lleva a la ciudad de Lima donde vende sus productos a diferentes centros artesanales. Ya son 35 años que se dedica a la artesanía y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Francisco requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como laca, barniz, arcilla y otras cosas más.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Francisco was born in the city of Pisaq (in Peru), and is 58 years old.  He is married, and has five children from this relationship.  He currently lives in the city of his birth, which is also where he works. He works making handicrafts from ceramics which he takes to the city of Lima, where he sells his products to various handicrafts centers.  He has been working in this business for 35 years, and it is going very well for him thanks to the dedication that he brings to her work.

Francisco is requesting the loan to purchase materials such as lacquer, varnish, clay, and other additional items.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as lacquer, varnish, clay, and other additional items.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco.  Juana is 38 years old and lives with her partner and three children between the ages of 13 and 22.  

Juana rents a storefront in which she runs a small restaurant that serves spicy dishes as well as chicha, a Peruvian fermented corn beverage, and beer.  Juana has run this business for six years and is requesting a loan in order to purchase beer, equipment and a television for her restaurant as well as tables, benches and cups.  She says that she works to support her children, to put food on the table and to pay for water and electricity.

loans.use: to purchase beer, tables, benches, cups and a television for her restaurant.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. She is 52 years old and lives with her partner. She has five children between the ages of twenty and 35.

Gregoria has owned a restaurant for six years where she serves breakfast and lunch. She says that her most popular dishes are lamb’s head and pork adobo, a Peruvian soup.

Gregoria is requesting a loan of 800 PEN from Asociación Arariwa in order to purchase cooking ingredients like chicken, meat, and vegetables for her restaurant. Her dream is to use the profits from her restaurant to open a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like chicken, meat, and vegetables in bulk.

loans.name: Katy Gloria

texts.en:
Katy Gloria is one of 21 members of the village bank “Sumac Ayllu” located in the Andean highlands of Cusco. Katy Gloria is twenty years old and lives with her partner. To make a living, she raises chickens to sell at the market. She purchases the chickens when they are just chicks, and buys feed and medicine to care for them when they are sick.

Katy Gloria is requesting a loan of 500 PEN from Asociación Arariwa in order to buy more chicks. Her dream is to open a store that sells clothes one day.

loans.use: to buy more chicks.

loans.name: Angie Marisela

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal 100% Charapoto. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar vive la señora Angie, tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tienen un hijo de 1 año y seis meses de nacido el cual es su vida completa. El marido es chofer de volqueta.
 
Ella es una joven madre y ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto colaborar con los gastos del hogar, se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo. Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes. Trabaja cinco días a la semana, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana o cada quince de acuerdo a lo que quieran sus clientes. Su mercadería se la envían desde Guayaquil ciudad en la cual nació y donde vive su familia, ella lleva más de 4 años con su negocio y le va muy bien a pesar de que con su hijo pequeño se le hace complicado realizar sus recorridos pero sigue adelante ya que sabe que es por su bien y de su familia.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas, camisetas, blusas y ropa de niños. Lleva tres años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y sin tantos requisitos.

Su sueño es tener un local propio.
texts.en:
In the city of Charapoto, the Communal Bank 100% Charapoto meets every 15 days. This region is known for its traditional culture and, moreover, for being a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province which are San Jacinto and San Clemente.

In this location lives Ms. Angie who is 23 years old, is married and the fruit of this relationship is a 1.5 year old son who, since his birth, is her entire life. Her husband is a dump truck driver. 

She is a young mother and housewife who, in order to obtain her own resources and with this to collaborate on the expenses of the home, dedicates herself to the sale of clothing through a catalogue.  Her manner of sales is door to door and she also sells from her home where her clients come. She works 5 days per week, selling her products on credit and collecting payment each week, or every 15 days, in agreement with what her clients want. Her merchandise is sent to her through Guayaquil, the city in which she was born, where her family lives. She has spent more than 4 years on her business and it is going very well, in spite of her tiny son who has made it very difficult for her to complete her travels, but she keeps progressing because she knows that it is for the good of her family. 

This loan is to buy pants, shirts, tank tops, blouses and clothing for children. She has spent 3 years in the Banco Comunal and she likes it because the loans are quick and without too many restrictions.

Her dream is to have her own store.

loans.use: To buy pants, shirts, tank tops, blouses and clothing for children.

loans.name: Serenidad Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Serenidad, se conformó en el año 2009, gracias a la Sra. Maria que formó parte de otro grupo anteriormente, que al desintegrarse dicho grupo, desidia contactar con la asesora y formar su propio grupo con sus amigas y vecinas del barrio, logró juntar a 15 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 11º ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
La sra. Maria se dedica a la ventas de remedios naturales, es decir vende hierbas medicinales de todo tipo. Ella comenta que es un trabajo muy agotador y sacrificado, pero que pese a ello le gusta lo que hace, pues es un trabajo honrado y digno.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de remedios naturales, como ser menta, burrito, manzanilla y demás remedios. El grupo está agradecido por la oportunidad que le da la fundación y kiva.
texts.en:
The "Serenidad" Women's Communal Bank was formed in 2009 thanks to Mrs. Maria. She was previously part of another group; when she left, she decided to contact the adviser and form her own group with her friends and neighbours. She was able to join together fifteen women who are very happy and united working together. They are now in their eleventh cycle in the program.
Maria sells natural remedies; she sells all kinds of medicinal herbs. She tells us that this is a very exhausting and difficult job, but she likes it anyway because it is good, honest work.
She is requesting this loan for the purchase of natural remedies, such as mint, burrito leaf, and camomile. The group is grateful for the opportunity that the Foundation and Kiva are offering them.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies for the next sale.

loans.name: Luis Eliseo

texts.es:
Luis tiene 48 años de edad, vive con su pareja juntos tienen 3 hijos, cuyas edades comprenden 15,19 y 21 años, a los cuales el ama mucho y son su razón de vivir y salir adelante, como buen peruano ama nuestra comida	y uno de los platillos que más le gusta es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”, además nos comenta que el se graduó como profesor de historia, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar contabilidad.

Luis es chofer de taxi, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 12 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 50 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y amable con los clientes.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado el podrá realizar mantenimiento y reparación a su vehículo con ello manejara con seguridad y le permitirá seguir trabajando para poder cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Luis is 48 years old, he lives with his partner and together they have three children whose ages are 15, 19 and 21 years. He loves them very much and they are his reason for living and for getting ahead. Like all good peruvians he loves our food and one of the dishes that he likes the most is the rich "Arroz con pollo" (rice and chicken). In addition, he told us that he graduated as a history teacher, but he would have liked to study accounting.

Luis is a taxi driver. He spends close to 12 hours per day on doing his job and he can attend to up to 50 clients in a day. He believes that he does well in his business because he is very responsible and friendly with his clients.

Luis is very grateful for the loans from Kiva because with the support that they have provided he will be able to complete the maintenance and repair of his vehicle and with this he will be able to drive safely and it will permit him to continue working to complete his grandest dream "to have his own house."

loans.use: to pay for the repair and the maintenance of his vehicle.

loans.name: Bouraïma

texts.fr: Bouraïma est âgée de 54 ans et est marié à un certain Aminatou. Le couple a six enfants, tous scolarisés. En dehors des six enfants, Bouraïma a deux autres enfants à leur charge. Bouraïma vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Bouraïma a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire et a appris ensuite la couture, une activité qu'il exerce depuis vingt cinq ans environs. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à subvenir à ses besoins tout en assurant les besoins de ses enfants. Bouraïma désire acquérir une nouvelle machine à broder et d'autres fournitures de couture ; ce qui lui permettra de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour ce faire, Bouraïma sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits obtenus précédemment ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Bouraima is 54 years old.  His wife’s name is Aminatou. They have six children, all in school. In addition to his six children, Bourama has two other children in his care. Bouraima lives together with his wife and children. The spouses jointly provide for various family expenses. Bouraima has stopped his formal education at the primary school level, and later learned tailoring, a trade he has been working in for about 25 years. This business brings him a revenue which allows him to support himself and his children. Bouraima would like to buy a new embroidery machine and other sewing supplies; this will allow him to better accommodate customer requests. In order to do so, Bouraima is seeking his third loan from ALIDé, having duly repaid the two prior loans.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies,  an embroidery machine and cloth.

loans.name: Ayaovi

texts.fr:
Ayaovi est un homme âgé de 38 ans. Il est célibataire. Il a cinq enfants. 
Ayaovi travaille comme vendeur depuis 2010. Il vend des poissons braisés pour tous clients dans son kiosque. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir pas satisfaire toute sa clientèle.
Ayaovi a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des poissons et réaménager son kiosque. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Ayaovi voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ayaovi is a 38-year old man. He is unmarried and has five children. He has been working as a vendor since 2010. Ayaovi sells braised fish to anyone at his kiosk. He buys his ingredients in Lomé. He works alone. At the moment, his main problem is not being able to satisfy all his customers. 

Ayaovi has requested his second loan from WAGES to buy some fish and to renovate his kiosk. He wants to reinvest in his business.

Over the next few years, Ayaovi would like to increase the size of his business. He says that he plans on using the profits to care for his family.

loans.use: to buy materials for renovating his kiosk

loans.name: L’Heure De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe L’HEURE DE DIEU est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Pascaline Ayaba, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Pascaline Ayaba est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un certain Georges. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pascaline Ayaba vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la famille. Pascaline Ayaba a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Il y a deux ans que Pascaline Ayaba mène comme activité, la vente des vêtements, des chaussures et des produits de beauté dans un quartier du Bénin. Pascaline Ayaba s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et au Togo. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire, Pascaline Ayaba sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe L’HEURE DE DIEU, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The L'HEURE DE DIEU group is made up of three women from the same neighborhood.  The group representative, named Pascaline Ayaba, has her hand raised in the photo.  She is 33 years old and married to a man named Georges.  The couple has two children, both in school and in their care.  Pascaline Ayaba lives with her husband and children and shares the family's expenses with her husband.  She left school at the primary level.  For two years Pascaline Ayaba has been selling clothing, shoes, and beauty products in a Benin neighborhood.  She buys her products in a market in Benin and in Togo.  In order to satisfy her customers and increase her sales, Pascaline Ayaba, with the other members of the L'HEURE DE DIEU group, is requesting a first loan through ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: L’Eternel Est Mon Berger Group

texts.fr: Le groupe L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, du nom de Bernadette est celle ayant une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupe sollicite pour la deuxième fois l’appui financier de ALIDé. Bernadette n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Bernadette est âgée de 52 ans et ne vit plus avec son mari. Bernadette est mère de cinq enfants tous scolarisés dont trois à sa charge. Bernadette assure seule ses divers besoins et ceux de ses enfants. Pour subvenir aux diverses charges de la maison, Bernadette mène comme activité depuis quatre ans, la vente de nourritures (pâte de maïs, riz) dans un quartier du Bénin. Bernadette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et de mieux satisfaire leur clientèle, Bernadette et les autres membres du groupe L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Leur ambition est d’accroître le niveau de leur activité.
texts.en:
The group L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER is composed of three persons who lives in the same district in Benin. The group’s representative, Bernadette, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Having the goal of boosting their businesses, so as to cope better with the customer demand, the members of this group are requesting financial support from ALIDé for a second time. 

Bernadette never attended school. She is 52 years old and no longer lives with her husband. She is the mother of five children, all provided with education. Three of the children are still in her care. She alone ensures that her various needs are met, as well as those of her children. 

To support the household, Bernadette has been selling food (corn mash, rice) for four years in a district in Benin. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin.

With the goal of bolstering their businesses and satisfying their customers further, Bernadette and the other members of the group L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER are requesting a second loan from ALIDé. Their ambition is to increase the level of their business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and corn.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel nació en la comunidad de Amaru de la ciudad Pisaq (Perú) y tiene 73 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, él tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio y también tiene una pequeña carpintería en su domicilio donde elabora todo tipo de muebles de madera como por ejemplo mesas, sillas, puertas, etc. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la carpintería y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 
Miguel requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como cola de carpintero, clavos, madera y otras cosas. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Miguel was born in Amaru community, in the city of Pisaq (Peru).  He is 73 years old and lives with his common-law wife.  The couple have two children.  Miguel currently lives in the city of Pisaq and this is where he carries out his business activities.  He has a small grocery store in his home and also has a small carpentry workshop where he makes all kinds of wooden furniture such as tables, chairs, doors, etc.  He  has been in the carpentry trade for several years and it is doing very well thanks to the effort that he puts into his work.

Miguel needs this loan to buy work materials such as carpenter's glue, nails, wood, etc.

The members of the 'Mosoq Ñusta' community bank meet once a month in Pisaq district, in Calca province (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and for being home to one of the seven wonders of the world: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as carpenter's glue, nails, wood, etc.

loans.name: Afia

texts.fr:
Afia est une femme âgé(e) de 24 ans. Elle est mariée å un  magasinier. Elle a 04 enfants. 
Afia travaille comme revendeuse de sacs de charbons de bois de tubercules et de miels depuis 2008. Elle vend à domicile à ses clients et s’approvisionne à Notsé (une localité située à quelques kilomètres de la ville de Lomé. Une personne l’aide dans l’exercice de son activité.
Afia a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des ignames et des bidons de miels. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Afia voudrait assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Afia is a 24-year-old woman. She is married to a shopkeeper and has four children. Afia has been working as retailer of sacks of charcoal, tubers, and honey since 2008. She sells out of her home to her customers, and she gets her supplies in Notsé (a town located a few kilometers from the city of Lomé). One person helps her in operating her business. 

Afia has requested her first loan from WAGES to buy some yams and containers of honey. She wants to reinvest in her business. Over the next few years, Afia would like to ensure that her family’s vital needs are met.

loans.use: to buy yams and honey

loans.name: Vazha

texts.en:
Vazha is 59 years old.  He lives in a small village in the Kakheti Region with his wife, Tina, two sons aged 14 and 12 years and his mother, who is retired.  Vazha is a car artisan.  He has a small workshop and provides car repair services to the local population.  In addition to his main job, he is actively involved in the family agricultural business.  They have a milk cow and a pig.  Tina produces cheese and sells it at the local market. The family’s total average monthly income is 350 laris. 

Vazha has requested a loan to expand the pig farm.  He plans to purchase piglets and raise them.  After five or six months, Vazha will begin selling the piglets.  The sale of the piglets will provide the family with additional income, which will be used for improving their living conditions and financing the children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to expand his pig farm.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is from Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is thirty years old. Carmelita is married and has two children. 

To make a living, Carmelita runs a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community. Carmelita has been in her business for six years and earns 6,870 PHP a month for these activities.

Carmelita is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. In 2009, Carmelita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a married woman with two dependents. Lilia is forty-five years old, and resides in Clarin, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. Lilia owns and operates a retail business to earn a living and she's been doing this for two years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP from the business. 

She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell. In 2006, Lilia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Lilia wants to build house and to help her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is a married woman who has two children. Elvira is forty-five years old, and resides at Catadman, Ozamis City: Philippines. Elvira raises pigs for sale to earn a living and she's been in this business for two years. Each month, she earns 2,500 PHP doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 4,150 PHP to purchase livestock feed and other supplies. In 2010, Elvira joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Elvira wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and other supplies.

loans.name: German

texts.en:
German is single, fifty-two years old and lives in the Philippines.

German operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for four years and every month he earn 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP to repair his existing vehicle so it can give better service.

German has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2010. In the future, German hopes to gain double the income from his business.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle so it can give better service.

loans.name: Aliboy

texts.ru: Алибой- один из успешных клиентов организации, который кредитуется с 2006 года. Женат имеет троих детей. В самом начале своей кредитной истории он получал сумму кредита 300 сомони, на которую он покупал один мешок риса и постепенно увеличил свой товарооборот до 7000 сомони. Он покупает рис у дехкан, которые привозят ему по оптовой цене, несколько мешков риса, которые он продаёт в течении двух недель и опять покупает новый товар. В данный момент у него около 800 кг риса, который пользуется большим спросом у населения, ведь таджикский народ любитель национального плова.
texts.en: Aliboy is one of the most successful clients of our organization and has been working with us since 2006.  He is married and has three children.  At the onset of his credit history, he obtained a loan in the amount of 300 somoni, which he used to buy one bag of rice and gradually increased his product turnover to 7000 somoni.  He buys rice from dekhan farmers, who deliver several bags of rice to him at a wholesale price.  He sells the rice during the course of two weeks and then buys new product again.  Currently, Aliboy has about 800 kilograms of rice, which is in high demand among the residents because the Tajik people love the national plov dish.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory of rice

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнаре 45 лет, замужем, имеет двоих детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, Гульнара начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммой 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гульнары, на сегодня в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 головы дойных коров и 20 голов овец, 1,6га орошаемой земли, где она выращивает фасоль и картофель, а также 1 га арендованной земли с многолетними травами.  Для дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Гульнара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух дойных коров и десяти овцематок. Доходы Гульнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Gulnara is 45 years old, married and has two children.  In search of a financial source for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry and farming with an initial sum of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistent work, Gulnara's business currently has two heads of dairy cows and twenty sheep, and 1.6 hectares of irrigated land, where she grows beans and potatoes, and also 1 hectare of leased land with multi-year herbs.  In order to further expand her business, Gulnara requested a loan in the sum of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy two dairy cows and ten ewes.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Hayridin

texts.ru: Хайридин просит кредит для приобретения необходимых запчастей и ремонта автомобиля.
texts.en: Hayridin is requesting this loan to purchase necessary spare parts and repair his vehicle.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: Luciana

texts.es:
Luciana nació en la ciudad de Taray de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 50 años de edad, ella está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a  vender gelatinas y tortas de forma ambulatoria subiendo a los buses que se dirigen a la ciudades de Cusco y Calca y tambien tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes.  
Luciana requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo harina, leche, huevo, mantequilla, naranjas, vainilla y otras cosas más que se necesitan para preparar más tortas. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Luciana was born in the city of Taray in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru), and is 50 years old.  She is married, and has six children from this relationship. She currently lives in the city of Pisaq, which is also where she works. She works selling jellies and cakes as a street vendor, going up to the buses that head to the cities of Cusco and Calca.  She also has a small grocery store.

Luciana is requesting the loan to purchase supplies; for example flour, milk, eggs, butter, oranges, vanilla and other additional items that she needs for making more cakes.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase supplies; for example flour, milk, eggs, butter, oranges, vanilla and other additional items

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is twenty-nine years old, and married with three children. Meriam has been engaged in gardening and corn production for ten years and earns 12,000 PHP monthly. 

In 2008, she become a part of GDMPC. Now, she's taking a loan of 23,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She is positive and hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Lando

texts.en:
Lando is from Segatic Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is thirty-nine years old. Lando is married and has six children. To make a living, Lando raises crops, mainly bananas. Lando has been in his business for six years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month from it. 

In 2008, Lando joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lando is requesting a new loan of 8,770 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is a forty-nine-year-old married mom of two children. She is living in Segatic Daku, Misamis Occidental Philippines, where her wide array of corn production is located. She normally receives PHP 3,000 a month. 

In 2010, Analiza joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase fertilizers such as manure to increase production. When the crop gets sold, the revenue from it will be allotted to expanding the business area to earn more income and to sustain her daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Los Portales Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Los Portales” es un banco comunal que pertenece a la Asociación Arariwa y está conformado por 6 mujeres y 3 varones. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días y todas las socias tienen que estar presentes en las reuniones programadas sino pagan una multa. La mayoría de los socios son vecinos y tienen una buena amistad y viven en el distrito de Paruro de la provincia de Paruro del departamento  del Cusco. Nuestros socios son gente muy trabajadora y muy ingeniosa, ellos se dedican principalmente a la ganadería y agricultura, ellos cuentan con bastos terrenos y venden lo que sus tierras producen, según las fechas de siembra y cosecha, ellos cuando no están en sus tierras se dedican al comercio, comprando y almacenando víveres para su futura venta. Los socios solicitan el préstamo para así seguir reinvirtiendo en sus diferentes actividades. Nuestros socios agradecen y valoran el préstamo otorgado ya que en la ciudad de Paruro ellos solo tienen este apoyo financiero.

La socia Delia tiene 35 años y vive en la ciudad de Paruro. Delia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que trabaja en una entidad financiera del estado en la ciudad de Paruro y trabaja en el área de servicio de limpieza, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, chanchos y gallinas. En esta oportunidad la socia Delia requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes.
texts.en:
“Los Portales” Communal Bank is part of the “Asociación Arariwa” and is comprised of six women and three men.  The Communal Bank meets every thirty days and all members must be present at the scheduled meetings or pay a fine.  Most of the members are neighbors as well as good friends.  They live in the Paruro district, province of Paruro province, Cusco department.  Our members are very ingenious and hard-working.  They are mainly engaged in cattle-raising and farming.  They have rough terrain and sell the crops the land produces, according to the sowing and harvesting seasons.  When they are not working on their land, they are engaged in trade, buying and storing provisions for future sale.  The members are requesting the loan to continue re-investing in their various businesses.  Our members appreciate and value the loans offered as this is the only source of financial support available in Paruro.  
Delia is 35 years old and lives in the city of Paruro.  She is an enterprising and hard-working woman who provides cleaning services to a state financial institution in Paruro.  She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens, and pigs.  At this time, she is requesting the loan to purchase more small animals such as guinea pigs.

loans.use: to purchase small animals such as guinea pigs.

loans.name: Biviana

texts.es:
Biviana nació en la comunidad de Amaru de la ciudad de Pisaq (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 42 años de edad, ella es viuda y tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde  nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella tiene una pequeña tienda escolar en unos de los colegios de la comunidad de Cuyo Chico, ella también se dedica  a la proveer materiales para la elaboración de artesanía como por ejemplo ocarinas y pitos de agua, ella despacha 2000 unidades a la ciudad de Lima y cada unidad lo vende a S/. 1. 20 nuevos soles. Ya son ocho años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 
Biviana requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo arcilla. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Biviana was born in the community of Amaru in the city of Pisaq (Cusco, Peru) and is 42 years old.  She is a widow and has three children.  Currently she lives in the same city where she was born and where she works.

She has a small school store in some of the schools in the community of Cuyo Chico.  She also works supplying materials to make handicrafts such as ocarinas and water whistles.  She sends 2000 units to the city of Lima and sells each unit for 1.2 PEN.  She has had this business for eight years now and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her job.

Biviana needs the loan to buy materials such as clay, for example.

The members of Mosoq Ñusta Communal Bank meet every month in the district of Pisaq in the province of Calca (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for its tourism, its commerce, its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world is there, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy materials such as clay.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas tiene 55 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en el departamento de Apurímac provincia de Andahuaylas pero vive en la ciudad de Pisaq de la provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Felicitas y su esposo tiene un taller donde elaboran cosas de metal mecánico, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar fierros, soldaduras y muchas cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le ha va muy bien. 

Felicitas pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Felicitas is 55 years old. She is married, and has four children from this relationship. She was born in the department of Apurímac in Andahuaylas province, but she lives in the city of Pisaq in Calca province in the department of Cusco in Peru.  

Felicitas and her husband have a workshop where they make things from metal.  On this occasion, she is requesting the loan to purchase iron, solder, and many other things. She has been working in this business for several years, and it has been going very well for her.

Felicitas belongs to the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa.  She is grateful for the opportunity being given to her by this means, and agrees to comply with making her repayments according to the schedule.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase iron, solder and many other items.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga tiene 33 años de edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella vive en la distrito de Pisaq provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Dominga se dedica a la venta de ropa y artesanía en uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad de Pisaq,  ella requiere el préstamo para incrementar el capital del negocio y desea comprar artesanía como mantas, chullos, guantes, ponchos y otras cosas más. Dominga pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Dominga is 33 years old. She is in a common-law marriage, from which she has two children.  She lives in the district of Pisaq in Calca province, in the department of Cusco in Peru.

Dominga works selling clothing and handicrafts in one the most popular markets in the city of Pisaq.  She is requesting the loan to increase her business' capital, and she wants to purchase handicrafts such as blankets, knit hats, gloves, ponchos and other additional items.

Dominga belongs to the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa. She is grateful for the opportunity being given to her by this means, and agrees to comply with making her repayments according to the schedule.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase handicrafts such as blankets, knit hats, gloves, ponchos and other additional items

loans.name: Amin Lolo

texts.fr:
Amin est une femme âgé(e) de 30 ans. Elle est mariée å un employé au port. Elle a 02 enfants. Amin travaille comme revendeuse de bijoux  depuis 2009. Elle vend de façon ambulante aux clients et achète à Cotonou( Bénin). 
Amin a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bijoux de bonne qualité. Elle voudrait avoir plus de bénéfice pour louer une boutique et voir sa famille s'épanouir.
texts.en:
Amin is a 30-year-old woman who is married to a harbor employee and has two children. She has been a jewelry reseller since 2009. She buys her merchandise in Cotonou (Benin) and conducts her sales door-to-door.

Amin is seeking her first loan from WAGES to buy high-quality jewelry. She would like to increase her profits to rent a shop and ensure her family’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Issifou

texts.fr:
Issifou est un homme âgé de 29 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a un enfant.
Issifou travaille comme revendeur depuis 2006. Il vend des pneus, des jantes et des écrous pour tous clients à Akodessewa. Il achète les produits au port autonome de Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir pas satisfaire toutes les demandes.
Issifou a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pneus, des jantes et des écrous. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Issifou voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille.
texts.en: Issifou is a 29-year-old man.  He is married to a retailer and has one child.  He has been working as a retailer since 2006.  He sells tires, rims, and nuts to customers in Akodessewa.  He buys his products in the autonomous port of Lomé, and works alone.  At the moment, Issifou's main difficulty is in meeting all the demand.  Issifou requested his first loan through WAGES in order to buy tires, rims, and nuts.  He wants to reinvest in his business.  In the next few years, Issifou would like to expand his business.  He says that with the profits he plans to ensure a bright future for his family.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba de la provincia de La Convención (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 60 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, él se dedica a la elaboración de cerámica y tiene su taller en su domicilio, él pertenece a una Asociación de artesanos de la ciudad de Pisaq. Ya son diez años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Santiago requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo cofres, keros, salamancas, saleros y otras cosas más.     

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Santiago was born in the town of Quillabamba in the province of Convención (Cusco, Peru). He is 60 years old and has a partner with whom he has three children. Currently he lives and works in the town of Pisaq. He makes pottery and has a workshop in his home.  He belongs to the Artisans’ Association in Pisaq and has been a potter for ten years. His business is doing well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.

Santiago needs a loan to buy materials such as boxes, moulds, and saltcellars.
